main event: A pilot on a PAL flight observed a metallic missile-like object hovering over Bohol Island, leaving a smoke trail behind.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be approximately 15,000 feet or less in altitude.,The sighting lasted for about 90 seconds.,The object appeared to be spinning before it entered a thick cloud layer.,The pilot reported the sighting to local authorities and the CAA.,There was no indication of any missing aircraft following the sighting.
